name: Ash-JS
tagline: A javascript port of Ash (an Actionscript 3 entity framework for game development)
body:
Ash-JS
======

A javascript port of Ash (an Actionscript 3 entity framework for game development - [https://github.com/richardlord/Ash](https://github.com/richardlord/Ash))

[Visit The Ash Framework site](http://www.ashframework.org) for more information about the original Actionscript 3 framework, for ports to other languages and for demos using the framework.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
